description.narrative: In the COVID-19 environment, this Project positions the private sector as key to support the economic recovery process during this acute shock, shortening the time it will take for the most vulnerable to return to their traditional income-earning opportunities. The Project Outcome will be realized by providing access to finance/liquidity to the ultimate beneficiaries, the Turkish exporters/importers to sustain operations and to expedite post-crisis recovery.

The Project is an increase to an existing funded risk sharing facility with MUFG Bank, Ltd. (MUFG) (the existing project #43273 originally disclosed in October 2020). IFC shares the risk up to 50%-50% in a portfolio of senior loans that MUFG provides to banks in the Central Asia and Turkey region. The Project will increase the portfolio by US$50 million. MUFG also uses the funds provided by IFC to invest in new Sustainable Energy Finance (SEF) projects.
